sentences.en: Applicants are asked to send in a CV and a covering letter.
sentences.cn: 申请人需要提交一份简历和附函。

sentences.en: Check the accuracy of everything in your CV.
sentences.cn: 请核对简历中的每个细节，务必准确无误。

sentences.en: CV of microtitration is in a range 1.25 % ～2.89 %.
sentences.cn: 微量滴定法变异系数CV为1.25%-2.89%.

sentences.en: Finally, take one more minute to check spelling mistakes or logical flaws of your CV and cover letter before you send them out. Good luck!
sentences.cn: 最后，在寄出你的简历和求职信之前，多花一分钟时间检查拼写错误或逻辑漏洞，这不会是无用功。祝你好运！

sentences.en: I need to update my CV.
sentences.cn: 我需要更新我的简历。

sentences.en: If you fit the bill, send a CV to Rebecca Rees.
sentences.cn: 如果你符合要求，就寄一份简历给丽贝卡·里斯。

sentences.en: If you have a resume or CV, linkto it from the About page, both as a downloadable PDF file and a Web-readableHTML file.
sentences.cn: 如果你有个人简历，就在“关于我”页面中创建链接，并提供一个PDF版和一个网络HTML版的下载链接。

sentences.en: Inspect the CV joints and front suspension component boots and seals.
sentences.cn: 检查CV接头和前悬吊部件保护罩和垫圈.

sentences.en: It shows how to prepare a CV, and gives tips on applying for jobs.
sentences.cn: 它说明了如何准备简历，并就如何申请职位提了些建议。

sentences.en: Please find enclosed my CV and a letter of recommendation from my school principal.
sentences.cn: 请查收我附件里的CV,和我学校推荐人的介绍信.

sentences.en: Please find enclosed my CV and letter of recommendation from my school principal.
sentences.cn: 请查收我附件里的cv,和我学校推荐人的介绍信.

sentences.en: Send a full CV with your job application.
sentences.cn: 随求职申请书寄上详尽的个人履历。

sentences.en: Send them a copy of your CV.
sentences.cn: 给他们寄一份你的简历。

sentences.en: The CV of each trait was calculated.
sentences.cn: 4计算各性状的变异系数(coefficientofvariation,CV).

sentences.en: The long list of jobs on her CV suggests a lack of stickability.
sentences.cn: 她简历上的那一长串工作说明她没长性。

sentences.en: This prospect is supposed to make me want to work harder, complain less and polish my CV to parade gloss, so that I can be one of the lucky ones who gets to escape the rats and the rot and the rage.
sentences.cn: 这一愿景应该会驱使我，更加努力的工作，更少的发牢骚，不断润色我的简历然后用来招摇过市，这样我就能成为那些最终逃离耗子，腐烂，和愤怒的众多幸运儿中的一员。

sentences.en: This valve has a large internal opening and capacity ( Cv ).
sentences.cn: 这种阀门具有大的内部通路和流量 ( Cv ).

sentences.en: Your CV is your advert to sell yourself to an employer.
sentences.cn: 你的CV[ 个人履历表]就是将你推销给雇主的媒介.

sentences.en: Your cv should be short—two sides of a sheet of A4 paper should normally be enough.
sentences.cn: 简历应力求简短，通常A4纸两面的篇幅就足够了。

sentences.en: Your interview and CV also provide important information about you, so your tests results will not represent the be all and end all.
sentences.cn: 你的面试和简历也提供了关于你的重要信息，所以这些测试不会是评断你的最高指标。

trans.tran_cn: 变异系数，卡值，连续变动
trans.tran_en: a short written document that lists your education and previous jobs, which you send to employers when you are looking for a job
